Preference.android:title: Crash App to Send Report
Preference.android:summary: This will simulate a crash should it ever occur. This is used for judging purposes to demonstrate the bug reporting process.

Preference.android:title: Force Notification
Preference.android:summary: This will force send a notification that a user may recieve if that had a book due soon. This is used for judging purposes to demonstrate that notifications are implemented. After pressing this button you will have 5 seconds to exit the app to view the notification.
